description.description: We designed the game with realtime 2-player functionality. Each player tries to outbid their opponent while using guerilla tactics. A simple bidding game inspired by the combat system in the board game, Scythe.

Like many other projects, this small one started with a question: "Wouldn't it be cool if you had a square that divided into more squares when you clicked it?". Research into this led me to recursive components.
